title: Diversity Travel moves to Travelport
text:
0 comments Tom Newcombe Wed, 14 Oct 2015 09:53 Follow @thomasnewcombe Travelport has announced a multi-year contract with UK-based TMC Diversity Travel.
The agreement provides Diversity Travel with access to Travelport’s travel content inventory, which includes fares and ancillaries from airlines and more than 650,000 hotels of which 550,000 are independents.
Travelport is providing Diversity with access to ‘Smartpoint’ – a point of sale technology and Smartpoint development kit which allows the integration of the software with in-house agency systems.
Diversity Travel MD Christopher Airey, said: “Entering into a new agreement with Travelport as providers of industry-leading and innovative technology solutions will help us to offer our customers even more choice and flexibility.
“Our customers fly to far-flung corners of the world, often at short notice, so we needed a tailored technology solution to meet these requirements. In collaboration with Travelport, we are able to further improve our services to our clients and we are looking forward to developing our partnership.”
Travelport MD UK and Ireland, Simon Ferguson, said: “We are very pleased that Diversity Travel has agreed a new deal with Travelport.
“Diversity Travel receives complex information and is a business with very specific requirements, so we have developed a tailor-made technology solution which uses custom functionality together with fare distribution tools. I would like to thank the Travelport teams that worked in collaboration to meet Diversity Travel’s business objectives.”
